question: What is the name of the mobile application launched by the Union Agriculture Ministry, for better transportation of perishable agricultural goods during lockdown?
explanation:
The Union Agriculture Minister Narendra Singh Tomar has recently launched a mobile application named ‘Kisan Rath’, for better transportation of perishable agricultural goods during lockdown.
Developed by the National Informatics, the mobile application assists the farmers to find transport facility. The app is expected to include as many as 5 lakh trucks and 20,000 tractors in the chain, to transport the agricultural goods to markets. Recently, a nation-wide call centre has also been launched for the same purpose.
